threat: An authenticated attacker could use this issue to possibly revoke access from others, contrary to expected permissions.
An authenticated attacker could possibly use this issue to escalate their privileges.
An authenticated attacker could possibly use this issue to obtain access to restricted data, bypassing intended privileges.
An authenticated attacker could possibly use this issue to cause PostgreSQL to crash, resulting in a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code.
